00033 // Definicoes internas:
00034 #define MAIN_MODULE_INIT(cmd_init)      if(cmd_init==0){printf("    Erro em %s",#cmd_init);return(0);}
00035 #define MAIN_MODULE_CLOSE(cmd_close)    if(cmd_close==0){printf("    Erro em %s",#cmd_close);}

00037 // Cabecalhos especificos do modulo:
00038 void catch_signal(int sig);
00039 
00040 // Variáveis do modulo:
00041 volatile int flag_quit = 0;
00042 
00043 
00044 int main (int argc, char *argv[])
00045 {       
00046         signal(SIGTERM, catch_signal);
00047         signal(SIGINT, catch_signal);
00048 
00049         /* Avoids memory swapping for this program */
00050         mlockall(MCL_CURRENT|MCL_FUTURE);
00051         
00052         printf("\n\n\n\n***************************************************************");
00053         printf("\n**** Mobile Mapipulator Server Process");
00054         printf("\n***************************************************************\n");
00055 
00056         // robot module:
00057         printf("\n*** Iniciando o modulo robot...");
00058         MAIN_MODULE_INIT(robot_init());
00059 
00060         // robotserver module:
00061         printf("\n*** Iniciando o modulo servidor...");
00062         MAIN_MODULE_INIT(robotserver_init());
00063         
00064         printf("\n*** Servidor pronto e processando requisições.");
00065         while(!flag_quit && !kbhit()){
00066                 usleep(200000);
00067         }
00068 
00069         printf("\n*** Encerrando o modulo servidor...");
00070         MAIN_MODULE_CLOSE(robotserver_close());
00071         
00072         printf("\n*** Encerrando o modulo robot...");
00073         MAIN_MODULE_CLOSE(robot_close());
00074         
00075         printf("\n\n");
00076     return 1;
00077 }
